title: Toyota Prius
summary: The Toyota Prius (/ˈpriːəs/; Japanese:トヨタ・プリウス, Toyota Puriusu) is a car built by Toyota which has a hybrid drivetrain, combining an internal combustion engine with an electric motor. It was initially offered as a 4-door sedan, it has been produced only as a 5-door liftback since 2003.
